snippet.title: Kingdom Eighties | Summer of Greed Announcement Teaser | Wishlist Today
snippet.description:
A summer of Greed awaits in Kingdom Eighties, an all new game in the Kingdom series!
Wishlist and follow today and be RADICAL: https://store.steampowered.com/app/1956040/Kingdom_Eighties/
Follow Kingdom  on Twitter: https://twitter.com/kingdomthegame

When the mysterious Greed threatens a small middle-American town, a rag-tag band of brave kids are dragged in to an epic struggle of seemingly insurmountable odds to save their families, their neighborhood and their town.

Everyone knows the coolest decade was the 1980’s, right? The coolest cartoons, the coolest movies, the coolest TV shows. And Kingdom is the coolest indie strategy series out there. So, how about we put all that cool stuff together… Kingdom Eighties is a newly developed game within the popular Kingdom-series and will surprise experienced players, newcomers to the series, as well as anyone that remembers sitting around in their pajamas on a Saturday morning in front of the television.

About Fury Studios
Fury Studios, founded in 2019 by Raw Fury is based in Zagreb, Croatia and Stockholm, Sweden. Almost thirty employees are currently taking care of the development of the Kingdom franchise and West of Dead. In addition, Fury Studios supply 2D / 3D asset production and animations, technical support, multi-platform porting, code optimizations and quality control for Raw Fury's various partners and titles.

About Raw Fury
Raw Fury is a boutique indie (un)publisher founded in 2015 by Jonas Antonsson, Gordon Van Dyke, and David Martinez. We don’t care about genres or mechanics. We care about experiences and emotions. We want to help developers make magic.
